Html:
I've followed along with the documentation (http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=DevelopingRawr3), using visual web developer 2010 express.  When I click the play button it pops up IE with an error:

Line: 44Error: Unhandled Error in Rawr Code: 2104    Category: InitializeError       Message: Could not download the Silverlight application. Check web server settings     

Any ideas?

From what I can tell looking on the web it seems likely that the xap file can't be found, which is the result of compiling Rawr.Silverlight. Make sure that compiles correctly and if yes try manually copying it to the ClientBin of the web project. Also for compiling for yourself it would be probably more useful to compile the WPF version.
Thank you.  That was enough that I figured the rest out :).
